A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I couldn’t have been any more excited for this movie. Sadly\, I felt let down by large portions of it\, especially the beginning half. Snoke was swept under the rug with absolutely no backstory\, and Finn’s entire side story had no baring on the plot. For a character capable enough to create and organize the first order\, he was instantly killed without explaining why someone of his importance was missing through episodes 1-6. Furthermore\, the entirety of the plot would have been the same if Finn did not go on his mission. While I really wanted to enjoy this film\, I often felt it was poorly cut\, and just didn’t flow well. I sincerely hope Episode 9 will enjoy a return to form.
